amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds made available by this bill may be used to carry out commodity checkoff programs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds made available from being used to carry out commodity checkoff programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 49 - 377 (Roll no. 417).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 49 - 377 (Roll no. 417).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
